column6: Contemporary styled apartment with a beautiful color scheme attached. Consists of 1 Bedroom (Master), Dining area, 2 balconies, Kitchen (Fully equipped), Living Room, and Bathroom with bath/shower combo and two sinks included. \nLocated 24 miles from NRG Stadium; approximately 35 minutes away. \nLocated 22 miles from Downtown Houston; approximately 32 minutes away.
